47#ifndef __sockpp_datagram_socket_h
48#define __sockpp_datagram_socket_h
49
50#include "sockpp/socket.h"
51
52namespace sockpp {
53
55
62class datagram_socket : public socket
63{
65 using base = socket;
66
67 // Non-copyable
68 datagram_socket(const datagram_socket&) = delete;
69 datagram_socket& operator=(const datagram_socket&) = delete;
70
71protected:
76 static result<socket_t> create_handle(int domain, int protocol = 0) {
77 return check_socket(socket_t(::socket(domain, COMM_TYPE, protocol)));
78 }
79
80public:
82 static constexpr int COMM_TYPE = SOCK_DGRAM;
83
87 datagram_socket() noexcept {}
93 explicit datagram_socket(socket_t handle) noexcept : base(handle) {}
99 explicit datagram_socket(const sock_address& addr) {
100 if (auto res = open(addr); !res)
101 throw std::system_error{res.error()};
102 }
108 explicit datagram_socket(const sock_address& addr, error_code& ec) noexcept {
109 ec = open(addr).error();
110 }
115 datagram_socket(datagram_socket&& other) : base(std::move(other)) {}
121 datagram_socket& operator=(datagram_socket&& rhs) {
122 base::operator=(std::move(rhs));
123 return *this;
124 }
130 result<> open(const sock_address& addr) noexcept;
141 datagram_socket clone() const {
142 auto h = base::clone().release();
143 return datagram_socket(h);
144 }
154 result<> connect(const sock_address& addr) {
155 return check_res_none(::connect(handle(), addr.sockaddr_ptr(), addr.size()));
156 }
157};
158
160
167template <typename ADDR>
168class datagram_socket_tmpl : public datagram_socket
169{
171 using base = datagram_socket;
172
173public:
175 static constexpr sa_family_t ADDRESS_FAMILY = ADDR::ADDRESS_FAMILY;
177 using addr_t = ADDR;
179 using socket_pair = std::tuple<datagram_socket_tmpl, datagram_socket_tmpl>;
180
185 datagram_socket_tmpl() : base(create_handle(ADDRESS_FAMILY).value_or_throw()) {}
191 datagram_socket_tmpl(socket_t handle) : base(handle) {}
196 datagram_socket_tmpl(const ADDR& addr) : base(addr) {}
202 datagram_socket_tmpl(datagram_socket&& sock) : base(std::move(sock)) {}
207 datagram_socket_tmpl(datagram_socket_tmpl&& other) : base(std::move(other)) {}
213 datagram_socket_tmpl& operator=(datagram_socket_tmpl&& rhs) {
214 base::operator=(std::move(rhs));
215 return *this;
216 }
229 static result<socket_pair> pair(int protocol = 0) {
230 if (auto res = base::pair(addr_t::ADDRESS_FAMILY, COMM_TYPE, protocol); !res) {
231 return res.error();
232 }
233 else {
234 auto [s1, s2] = res.release();
235 return std::make_tuple<datagram_socket_tmpl, datagram_socket_tmpl>(
236 datagram_socket_tmpl{s1.release()}, datagram_socket_tmpl{s2.release()}
237 );
238 }
239 }
244 addr_t address() const { return addr_t(socket::address()); }
249 addr_t peer_address() const { return addr_t(socket::peer_address()); }
257 result<> bind(const ADDR& addr) { return base::bind(addr); }
267 result<> connect(const ADDR& addr) { return base::connect(addr); }
268
269 // ----- I/O -----
270
279 result<size_t> send_to(const void* buf, size_t n, int flags, const ADDR& addr) {
280 return base::send_to(buf, n, flags, addr);
281 }
289 result<size_t> send_to(const std::string& s, int flags, const ADDR& addr) {
290 return base::send_to(s, flags, addr);
291 }
299 result<size_t> send_to(const void* buf, size_t n, const ADDR& addr) {
300 return base::send_to(buf, n, 0, addr);
301 }
308 result<size_t> send_to(const std::string& s, const ADDR& addr) {
309 return base::send_to(s, addr);
310 }
320 result<size_t> recv_from(void* buf, size_t n, int flags, ADDR* srcAddr) {
321 return base::recv_from(buf, n, flags, srcAddr);
322 }
331 result<size_t> recv_from(void* buf, size_t n, ADDR* srcAddr = nullptr) {
332 return base::recv_from(buf, n, srcAddr);
333 }
334};
335
337} // namespace sockpp
338
339#endif // __sockpp_datagram_socket_h
